bibl.title: Letter from Henry Rose Carter to Laura Eugenia Hook Carter, July 21, 1916

div1.p: Carter describes his trip from Peru to Colombia via the Panama Canal.

div1.head: Letter from Henry Rose Carter to Laura Eugenia Hook Carter, July 21, 1916
div1.p:
This is Mary's birthday & the an-
niversary of the battle of Manassas. I remember
the day very well. I helped load a 4 horse waggon
with ice which was taken to B. D. Depot & sent up to
the wounded. I read all the accounts of the bat-
tle in the newspaper & told them to Ed. (my bro) &
Bob Kemp. Ed. did not - possibly could not read
them. For have I wandered from that time & place & Ned & Bob are dead.
Well I am now within 16 or 17 hours of Balboa- &
going north. We will go through the Canal on this vessel-
which goes direct to Colon- & return to Panama to a-
wait a streamer for Carthegena. Whether we will
all go up to Bogota or the party split & leave
some on the delta of the Magdalena, while Gor-
gas & the bulk of them go on to Bogota is not deci-
ded. Theoretically- no investigations should be made
in Columbia until the approval of the Colum-
bian Government is secured. Yet the trip will
take approximately 3 weeks - & 9 days up less than
that coming down & same days in the City. Except
Ascuncion it is probably the least visited capital
in S. A. & the least visited of the large towns,
It will be then well worth seeing. yet I have sug-
gested that Guiteras & myself stay & work up the
three towns in the delta,- all in close intercom-
munication.

I do not, of course, know whether to expect Laura
tomorrow or no, You do know & I will know
within - say - 18 hours. I will be satisfied that she has deci-
ded wisely whether I meet her or not

I have put the Vicuña rug with 3 of Wrightson's
are & two of Lyster's (& I think Mrs. Gorgas in a trunk
Wrightson is sending back to th N. Y. to re-
main “in Bond” there until we get back. That
There is too much risk of moths in carrying
it about in these hot countries - folded in a
trunk. In the trunk are also the 2 Ponchas, bought
in Quinto. If express goes to Balt. from the zone
-I don't think it does - I will express my part of this
booty direct to you at the Hospital. I doubt if I
can add any more to this-
